reviewText: I had purchased this item for my elderly mother. She loved it and used it often. As per my mother, it is great.

I thought the Tango portion was great, very entertaining, and watched it over & over.  Great skating choreography to the Tango.  The Tango music arrangement was great.  Some of it I recognize to be arranged by the great Viennese conductor, composer, & song writer, Robert Stolz.  Looks like fun to do and would make for a great local ice show for a skating club. The Carmen portion not so good.

This is one of the first figure skating tapes I've bought.  I love skating and I thought I'd enjoy it.  I did.  There are no big name stars here with the exception of Tatyana Tarasova.  It's a fine addition to any figure skating fan's video library.
The quality of this video is really bad. If I had seen it before purchase I would not have bought it
